results.title: A Randomized Clinical Trial of Levonorgestrel Intrauterine System with or without Metformin for Treatment of Endometrial Hyperplasia without Atypia in Indian Women
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ on @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ developed @<m>DISEASE_Amenorrhea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000568 @@@amenorrhea@@@ (P=0.0053) more frequently while @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ in group L developed regular cycles (P=0.027).

results.title: Novel Insights Into Monogenic Obesity Syndrome Due to INPP5E Gene Variant: A Case Report of a Female Patient
results.text_hl: At the age of 14 years, primary @<m>DISEASE_Amenorrhea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000568 @@@amenorrhea@@@ persists. The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ is managed by regular nutritional advice, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, antihypertensive medication, and non-invasive respiratory support during @DISEASE_Sleep_Wake_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D012893 @@@sleep@@@.

results.title: Role of metformin in correcting hyperinsulinemia, menstrual irregularity and anovulation in polycystic ovary syndrome.
results.text_hl: Our Objective was to observe the role of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in correcting @DISEASE_Oligomenorrhea @DISEASE_MESH:D009839 @@@oligomenorrhea@@@/@<m>DISEASE_Amenorrhea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000568 @@@amenorrhea@@@ and @DISEASE_Anovulation @DISEASE_MESH:D000858 @@@anovulation@@@ within six month in @DISEASE_Congenital_Hyperinsulinism @DISEASE_MESH:D044903 @@@hyperinsulinemic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@.
